long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When "Balance!" is installed and running, opening a new tab will display a menu of reminders for you to choose from. Activate a reminder by clicking on the switches and watch the clock appear! To set multiple reminders, open a new tab and repeat the previous sequence. Once the timer ends, an alert with appear on that tab and prompt you to complete your desired task. 

"Balance!" will not collect or distribute any of your personal or sensitive information and does not require any additional downloads or purchases. 

Please direct any questions, comments or concerns to balancehelpteam@gmail.com
